t: Answered Prayer for Deliverance from Adversaries
To the Chief Musician. With stringed instruments. A Contemplation of David when the Ziphites went and said to Saul, “Is David not hiding with us?”
Save*pn me, O God, by Your name, And*ld vindicate me by Your strength.
Hear*ld my prayer, O God; Give*ld ear to the words of my mouth.
For*ld strangers have risen up against me, And*ld oppressors have sought after my life; They*ld have not set God before them. Selah*ipg
Behold,*pn God is*i my helper; The*ld Lord is*i with those who uphold my life.
He*ld will repay my enemies for their evil. Cut*ld them off in Your truth.
I*ln will freely sacrifice to You; I*ld will praise Your name, O Lord,*s for it*i is*i good.
For*ld He has delivered me out of all trouble; And*ld my eye has seen its*i desire*i upon my enemies.
